name: Mystery Box - The Room
description:
Unlock bizarre boxes by solving intriguing enigmas

The third chapter of the 'Mystery Box' game series is a brand new exciting point-and-click escape room game within a beautifully tactile world and a revisited concept!

You're trapped inside dark rooms and must solve intriguing enigmas to open boxes and escape

Interact with bizarre mechanisms, think out of the box to gain your freedom, and discover historical unsolved mysteries

INTUITIVE CONTROLS AND DESIGN

This game makes you feel like you're touching the surface of each box for real!

INTRICATE PUZZLES

Zoom and examine several mechanisms to unlock each box

IMMERSIVE AUDIO

Play the game with your headphones on to get totally immersed in the adventure. It will be an unforgettable experience!

GOT STUCK?

Click the bulb button to get hints that will help you through the game

MULTI-LANGUAGE SUPPORT

Available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, and Japanese.

SHARE YOUR PROGRESS

Let your friends know how far you've gone on Mystery Box - The Room, they may want to compete with you ;)
